about.title: About me
about.content:
My name is AndrÃ©s Frei. I started programming over 20 years ago, from Buenos Aires, Argentina. My specialty is Full Stack development and database administration.

Among my achievements, I highlight the **implementation of scalable architectures** and the **optimization of high-performance systems**. I also specialize in **artificial intelligence**, working with language models and RAG.

Currently, I work with technologies like **PostgreSQL, Node.js, React, Next.js and Python**. I'm passionate about creating efficient solutions and staying updated with the latest development trends.
